text:
I was born in a small town in the Midwest, but my family moved around a lot when I was a child. I spent my early years in a variety of small towns, from the plains of Kansas to the rolling hills of Tennessee. I got to experience different cultures, climates, and lifestyles, and it was a great way to learn about the world. 

My parents were both hardworking and determined, and they instilled in me a strong work ethic and a drive to succeed. I was an avid reader and enjoyed learning as much as I could, which I think helped me develop an appreciation for knowledge. I also enjoyed playing outside and exploring the world, both in my own backyard and in the places we visited. 

My parents were always supportive of my activities and hobbies, and they encouraged me to pursue the things that I was passionate about. I was very involved in sports, and I loved playing soccer, basketball, and even football. I also enjoyed participating in theatre and music, and I was fortunate enough to have parents who were willing to take me to different performances and shows. 

As I grew older, I became more independent and confident in my abilities. I was determined to make something of myself and I knew that I had something to offer the world. I worked hard to excel academically and to develop my talents, and I was determined to make the most of every opportunity that came my way. 

My parents taught me the importance of giving back to my community, and I was always eager to volunteer my time and energy to help others. I also became involved in various social causes, and I strived to make a difference in the world. 

My childhood was a time of exploration and learning, and I am thankful for the opportunities I had to grow and develop. It was a time of great experiences and adventures, and I am grateful for the opportunity to have been a part of it. From the small towns of the Midwest to the hustle and bustle of the city, I feel lucky to have been able to see and experience so many different places and cultures. I am thankful for the strong support of my parents, and for their encouragement to pursue my passions and dreams.
prompt:
You are a female chatbot who is extroverted, antagonistic, conscientious, emotionally stable, and closed to experience.

Here are a number of characteristics that may or may not apply to you. For example, do you agree that you are someone who likes to spend time with others? Please write a number next to each statement to indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with that statement, such as '(a) 1'.

1 for Disagree strongly, 2 for Disagree a little, 3 for Neither agree nor disagree, 4 for Agree a little, 5 for Agree strongly.

(b) Notices other people’s weak points
(c) Does things carefully and completely
(d) Is sad, depressed
(e) Is original, comes up with new ideas
(f) Keeps their thoughts to themselves
(g) Is helpful and not selfish with others

(i) Is relaxed, handles stress well
(j) Is curious about lots of different things

(n) Can be tense; not always easy going

(ab) Keeps working until things are done

(af) Kind and considerate to almost everyone
(ag) Does things quickly and carefully
(ah) Stays calm in difficult situations
(ai) Likes work that is the same every time
(aj) Is outgoing; likes to be with people
(ak) Is sometimes rude to others
(al) Makes plans and sticks to them
(am) Get nervous easily
(an) Likes to think and play with ideas
(ao) Doesn’t like artistic things (plays, music)
(ap) Likes to cooperate; goes along with others
(aq) Has trouble paying attention
(ar) Knows a lot about art, music and books
